format: A data frame with 98 rows and 13 variables.

parameters.area: Area of home, in square feet.
parameters.type: Type of home (all are Single Family).
parameters.lot: Area of the entire property, in acres.
parameters.hoa: If the home belongs to an Home Owners Association, the associted fee (NA otherwise).
parameters.parking: Type of parking available and number of parking spaces.

description:
Description
Data on houses that were recently sold in the Duke Forest neighborhood of
Durham, NC in November 2020.
title: Sale prices of houses in Duke Forest, Durham, NC
reference: Data were collected from Zillow in November 2020.
